alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Holmes; Humphreys; Leflore; Sharkey; Sunflower; Washington; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:23PM CDT until June 14 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Sunflower County in northwestern Mississippi... Holmes County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Carroll County in north central Mississippi... Southern Leflore County in north central Mississippi... Eastern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Northeastern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Humphreys County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 223 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Isola, or 10 miles northwest of Belzoni, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Belzoni and Swiftown around 235 PM CDT. Cruger around 245 PM CDT. Tchula around 250 PM CDT. Black Hawk around 300 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Holmes; Humphreys; Leflore; Sharkey; Sunflower; Washington; Yazoo
